thread.title: VIDEO: Should Weller and Jane Hook Up on Blindspot?
thread.title_full: VIDEO: Should Weller and Jane Hook Up on Blindspot?

author: TV Guide
title: VIDEO: Should Weller and Jane Hook Up on Blindspot?
text: Posted Oct. 26, 2015 at 12:08 PM Updated at 3:30 PM Posted Oct. 26, 2015 at 12:08 PM Updated at 3:30 PM There's no shortage of questions surrounding the characters on NBC's Blindspot , but maybe the biggest one is this: How long before Weller ( Sullivan Stapleton ) and Jane ( Jaimie Alexander ) hook up? The ( maybe? ) childhood friends certainly share a strong bond, and on primetime dramas, that usually translates into romance. But don't expect Blindspot to drag out a will-they-or-won't-they situation over several seasons. Series creator Martin Gero has promised rapid answers to the show's mysteries - and has delivered, thus far - and we're guessing the potential Weller/Jane relationship will be no exception. "They have a very deep and powerful emotional connection, and they're both very good-looking people, so you never know," Gero told TVGuide.com at Comic-Con earlier this month. Still, should sparks fly between Weller and Jane, or would that be too much of a clich√©? Check out the video above to see what Gero and Stapleton have to say, and share your thoughts on a Weller/Jane romance in the comments! Other Links From TVGuide.com
